articles.title: Donald Trump ordered not to send threatening social media messages as bond set at $200,000 in Georgia case
articles.description: Trump was indicted in the Georgia case last week along with 18 co-defendants, the fourth set of charges against the former president this year. The bond agreement bars him from intimidating co-defendants, witnesses or victims in the case.
